sentences.sContent: But, once you have and you have a clear conscience, release it.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, once you have and you have a clear conscience, release it.
sentences.sCn: 一旦你清晰地感觉到良心的谴责的话，就放松点儿吧。

sentences.sContent: When I think about these unique assets, I get a clear picture of what WHO must do, what we can do, and what we should not do.
sentences.sContent_eng: When I think about these unique assets, I get a clear picture of what WHO must do, what we can do, and what we should not do.
sentences.sCn: 当我想到这些独特的资产时，我对世界卫生组织必须做什么，我们能够做什么和我们应该做什么有了一个清晰的蓝图。

synos.tran: 清楚的；清澈的；[气象]晴朗的；无罪的
通过；[计]清除；使干净；跳过

phrases.pCn: 不受阻碍；以内宽计算；用普通文字
完全透明的；[喻]极其明白，十分清楚
走开；把…清出；[经]办理海关出口手续
[戏谑语] 一点也不清楚，令人莫名其妙

remMethod.val: 把自己的耳朵(ear)清理干净(clear)

words.tran: 清晰地；明显地；无疑地；明净地

trans.tranOther: if the weather, sky, mist etc clears, it becomes better and there is more sun

trans.tranCn: 清楚的；无疑的；晴朗的，清澈的；畅通的；条理清楚的
trans.tranOther: expressed in a simple and direct way so that people understand

trans.tranCn: 扫清；使清楚；使清白无辜，证明…无罪
trans.tranOther: to make somewhere emptier or tidier by removing things from it
